backend/main.mo: Canister with accessâ€‘controlled user profiles and CRUD for booking leads using Map storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML root document loading the React app entry at /src/main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling simple page routing based on authentication.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper with header, logout, and mobile/desktop navigation for app pages.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Component rendering square or wide logo variants from static assets.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshing dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook managing login, stored identities, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and creating booking leads via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, applying global styles and base typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/BookingFormPage.tsx: Implements an authenticated booking form with validation, Internet Identity login prompts, and lead submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/LeadsPage.tsx: Displays booking leads with authentication checks, loading/error states, and formatted lead data in table or card views.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a login screen using Internet Identity with navigation options and authenticated identity display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session storage values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions including OKLCH variable-based colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Contains metadata about the project state, completed features, and requirements for the BISMI CABS website. Tracks implemented functionality such as login, branding, booking form, leads page, and navigation updates.
